text: Motion
Motion
...Comets seem to be mentioned a lot lately, huh?

Yes...!
It seems like it's coming soon, right...?

It's like a miracle that
it's getting closer to where I am.

I see...
Being drawn by gravity, huh.

Gravity and such,
we don't usually think about them, do we?

Yeah, that's right.
There's gravity, and there's even repulsion.

Even between people...
It might exist, right?
The way Producer-san and I met...

Gravity... huh?
Haha, maybe so.

Hehe...
Maybe every encounter is like that.
I wonder if it's the same for me and Hana-chan...

Haha, seems like you two hit it off right away.
I heard it from Hana too.

Hehehe...
My first friend since becoming an idol.

It made me happy when you said
it's okay not to use honorifics right away...

I see, that's good.
Hana was happy to have someone to talk to too.

And she even praised Haruki,
saying she's "reliable"...

Eh... really...?
Hehe...
You seem happy, huh?

Yes...!
Being praised gives me strength.

I'd be happy to receive lots of
praise from Producer-san too...
